Class BTHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • BTHelper

  • public class BTHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a Helper class to handle operations of the Binary Tree. The binary tree can be AVL or Binary Search Tree.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BTHelper(java.lang.String file, AVLTree<Entry> tree)
      Constructor to initialise instance variables and add entries to the AVL tree
      BTHelper(java.lang.String file, BinarySearchTree<Entry> tree)
      Constructor to initialise instance variables and add entries to the Binary Search tree

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Finds the entry from the Binary tree
      Entry find(java.lang.String slot)
      finds the Entry with a specific slot
      void printAllAreas()
      void function to print all areas
      java.lang.String printAreas(java.lang.String stage, java.lang.String day, java.lang.String time)
      Prints areas of a specif slot

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
